question: Which of the following is correct about Right to Private Defence?
option1: It is the right to protect one’s own person and property against the unlawful aggression of others
option2: The right is not endowed to everybody by the state
answer: It is the right to protect one’s own person and property against the unlawful aggression of others
explanation: Right to Private Defence is the right of a person to protect his/her own person and property against the unlawful aggression of others. It is a right available to everybody so that a person can help himself.
